Push_button_Digital_Input_State.title: Digital Input State
Push_button_Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Push_button_Digital_Input_Counter.title: Digital Input Counter
Push_button_Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

Push_button_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Push_button_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Push_button_Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Push_button_Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Push_button_Fractional_Timestamp.title: Fractional Timestamp
Push_button_Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
